prototypes.prototype: dim result as SQL::ResultSet = resultSetFromJSON(json as C [, ti as SQL::TableInfo [, alias as C]])

description.p: A string containing a JSON array of objects representing the table.
Returns a SQL::ResultSet that can be used to iterate over the records in the JSON array.

discussion.p: The *[xb:.resultSetFromJSON()]* SQL::Connection method creates a SQL::ResultSet from JSON and an optional table info (schema). This function uses the [Extension::JSON toResultSet() method] internally to convert the JSON to a SQL::ResultSet.

page.example:
dim json as c = <<%json% [ {"ID":"1","Company":"Company A","Last_Name":"Bedecs","First_Name":"Anna"}, {"ID":"2","Company":"Company B","Last_Name":"Solsona","First_Name":"Antonio"}, {"ID":"3", "Company":"Company C", "Last_Name":"Axen","First_Name":"Thomas"} ]
%json%
dim rs as sql::ResultSet dim cn as sql::connection rs = cn.ResultSetFromJSON(json) sql_resultset_preview(rs)
